text: Ñalnde O Mooɓitoyta ɓe denndaangal : "Ko onon yo onon yo dental jinna, gomɗii on ɗuɗɗinorii (majjingol) yimɓe ɓen". Yiɗɓe maɓɓe ɓen ka yimɓe wi'a : "Joomi amen, yoga amen dakmitorii yoga, men yottike ngal caatal=lajal amen ngal saatinanɗaa men". O Daala : "Ko Yiite ngen woni werde mon, ko on luttooɓe ton, si wanaa kon ko Alla Muuyi". Pellet, Joomi maaɗa ko Ñeeñuɗo, Annduɗo
